<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">                       .<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringswitch/#a3de12858bdbbd0b3da179d508ff2be75">Case</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;lp64f&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loongarchabi/#a19370946dd9514a9d3e18275e9f7b6fba09b260d81c6fe1cdf0386e65e5e3d5e4">ABI&#95;LP64F</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">                       .<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringswitch/#a3de12858bdbbd0b3da179d508ff2be75">Case</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;lp64d&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loongarchabi/#a19370946dd9514a9d3e18275e9f7b6fbae688d614de378b5e595020a7ac3c378c">ABI&#95;LP64D</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">                       .<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringswitch/#a7f0e82e8a818ca43926fceb49be81661">Default</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loongarchabi/#a19370946dd9514a9d3e18275e9f7b6fbab3d8d71ca8b3f20b7551c6db0b02a9da">ABI&#95;Unknown</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TargetABI;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To avoid the BP value clobbered by a function call, we need to choose a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// callee saved register to save the value. The &#96;last&#96; &#96;S&#96; register (s9) is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// used for FP. So we choose the previous (s8) as BP.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loongarchabi/#a52c76c78d8c7899d21f8466677f676a9"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcregister">MCRegister</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loongarchabi/#a52c76c78d8c7899d21f8466677f676a9">getBPReg</a>() &#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LoongArch::R31; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// end namespace LoongArchABI</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// end namespace llvm</span></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>
